page.title: 05GREETE VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Donated to the village in 1904 by Mrs. Jasper Moore in exchange for Â£1, Greete Village Hall is not purpose built. Present chairman is Mr.R. Rawlings with a committee of 10, secretary Mr.Low,treasurer Mr. H Cheese,W.I.representative Mrs. J.Wall. The hall is small by present day standards but is well equipped. Used weekly by Greete Young Farmers , (see page 1), Greete W.I. for alternate monthly meetings (see page6) by Greete Parochial Church Council and annually by campers from the North of England visiting Greete (see page 2).
